oai_dc:dc.dc:title: $\frac{n}{3}$-Neighbourly Moment-Angle Complexes and their Unstable Splittings
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Beben, Piotr
Grbić, Jelena
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Algebraic Topology
Mathematics - Commutative Algebra
55P15, 55U10, 13F55
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Given an $\frac{n}{3}$-neighbourly simplicial complex $K$ on vertex set $[n]$, we show that the moment-angle complex $\mathcal{Z}_K$ is a $co$-$H$-space if and only if $K$ satisfies a homotopy analogue of the Golod property.
